name: Scrap-Hack
description:
Summary

Scrap-Hack is an "Isometric Arena Brawler" developed by the team "The Rest of Us" in during the course of their winter semester 2020/2021 at Games Academy Berlin.

Fight for your Survival, slay all your enemies and be the last robot standing in this action-packed short session game! The robots will attack you relentlessy in escalating waves and will not stop until either you are dead or they are.

Will you defeat them? Will you be able to survive? Find out now and prove your skill!

This game features:

- 1 Arena - 4 Enemy Variations - 5 waves sectioned into 19 different parts The game can be played with and is optimized for Mouse + Keyboard, as well as Xbox Controller.

You move around either with WASD or the left controller stick, attack with the left mouse button or the X button and dash bu using the spacebar or A button. We hope you enjoy our game!
